name: Javier Polo Rivas
about: A passionate web developer with skills in Java, JavaScript, Node.js, and Astro. I'm always looking to learn and improve my skills through practical projects.

studies.degree: INTERMEDIATE DEGREE IN MICROINFORMATIC SYSTEMS AND NETWORKS (2018-2020)
studies.description: The Intermediate Degree in Microcomputer Systems and Networks trains in installation, maintenance and administration of computer systems, networks and technical support

studies.degree: HIGHER DEGREE IN WEB APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT (2020-2024)
studies.description: El grado superior de Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Web forma profesionales para crear, gestionar y mantener aplicaciones web dinámicas y seguras.

experiences.name: Worker at Ramon Polo S.A, an olive company in Dos Hermanas, I have been working for two summers but it was not what I wanted to dedicate myself to.
IT at Kampaoh, a camping and tent company, I was in charge of the company's technical support through a ticket system.
Web developer for the InstantGaming company, I have developed the instant gaming website, I really liked this project.
